title: Implement _pwm.c for custom alphabets
body: Currently, _pwm.c is modified to support only RNA alphabet (see 1064f24a). We could extend it to also handle the other custom alphabets and speed up secondary structure motif scanning.

title: More a question than an issue , LogOdds Threshold
body:
I was wondering how to filter out the severals motifs found in the final output using the LogOdds value.
[Here](http://cisbp-rna.ccbr.utoronto.ca/TFTools.php) it seems you set 6 ... Is there a maximum value for the LogOdds , like 10 or something ?

title: Issues with redirecting <stdout> in python3
body:
Hi Kevin,
There seems to be an issue with redirecting STDOUT in python3. The following script redirects motif hits to `test_hits.tab` with no issues in python2, but in python3, it creates an empty `test_hits.tab` file, and creates and writes to a file named `<stdout>` in the directory where `rnascan` is executed.

`rnascan -p test_rnacompete_pfm.txt --bg_seq background_prob.txt test.fasta > test_hits.tab`
